summary: Financial learning website with Blogs and Glossary sections; needs content management workflows for publishing formatted articles and maintaining a finance glossary.
known_issues: Build/deploy failed with configuration error message: "A configuration error has occurred. Please notify the Caffeine team."

existing_features.title: Add an admin-only bulk action to publish the user-provided glossary entries (starting from “CEDEL” through “Custody risk”) into the on-chain glossary using the existing backend batch API, so the terms become visible and searchable in the Glossary page.
Implement a small admin UI in the Glossary area that explains what will be imported and provides a confirmation step before publishing the bulk glossary entries.

new_feature_requests.summary: Glossary: add/maintain glossary entries (bulk import) including terms like CEDEL, Calendar spread, Call Money, CAPM, etc.
Blogs: support adding/uploading blog/articles into Blogs section with consistent professional formatting (title/subhead/body rules) and image placement.

projectName: Bulk add provided finance terms to Glossary (C-terms list)
